name: New Friends on Haunted Hill
description:
Your so-called "friends" have convinced you to spend the night in a haunted house. What could be inside?

This is a short game about making friends under unexpected circumstances.

Titlecard & some in-game art by Alyssa Dalangin

Music, writing, programming, and some in-game art by me!

Soundtrack available (for free!) here: https://twinklepark.bandcamp.com/album/new-friends-on-haunted-hill-ost
